thread.title: Why Successful Succession Planning Must Factor In Growth

author: wsjcom
title: Why Successful Succession Planning Must Factor In Growth
text:
Diane Compardo is managing partner of the Moneta Group’s Compardo Team in Clayton, Mo. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. As told to Lynn Shattuck.
With an aging population of advisers, there has been a lot of talk in the industry about succession planning. But if you want to grow your firm, replacing yourself isn’t enough—you have to plan for growth, too.
...
